pacman

Class SuperPacMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.GameCharacter
      • pacman.PacMan
        • pacman.SuperPacMan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visited

    public class SuperPacMan
extends PacMan
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar 'Mighty PacMan' represents the pacman while in super pacman mode. It contains its specific icons and speed.

      • SuperPacMan

        public SuperPacMan(GamePanel parent,
           int pixelLocationX,
           int pixelLocationY,
           int matrixLocationX,
           int matrixLocationY,
           int direction)
        A constructor for a new super pacman. receives the old pacman's (regular or mighty) location and direction
        Parameters:
        parent - - The game panel
        pixelLocationX - - The X location of the old pacman in the image
        pixelLocationY - - The Y location of the old pacman in the image
        matrixLocationX - - The X location of the old pacman in the matrix
        matrixLocationY - - The Y location of the old pacman in the matrix
        direction - - The direction of the old pacman
